name: Nerd Shooter
body:
# Nerd Shooter

Welcome to open game development. This Project is intended to be a framework for 2D Side Scrolling games. This project uses the open game library LibGDX. Feel free to fork and create your own adventure. Below is our **To Do List:**

* Add Options Menu
* Add Dripping Lava
* Add "Shooting" Entity Blocks
* Fix Any and All Bugs

Enjoy!!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
